name: Mandelbrot Explorer All Data File
summary: Learn about .MXAD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Mandelbrot Explorer all data (MXAD) files can be used to store zoomed images of fractals. They can be exported to .BMP, .JPG, .GIF, and .PNG image formats by selecting the following program option: File â†’ Save Image.
NOTE: MXAD files include the combined data that is stored separately in .MXCS and .MXFR files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
